slides.title: Behind the scenes
slides.body: Coding, expo and buying a car. Here’s what’s been going on →

slides.title: Cleaned the whole project.
slides.body:
The recording pipeline is now portable and ready to deploy outside my machine #docker

No more http://localhost only magic.

It’s structured, modular and of course overkill :p

slides.title: I may have overengineered it ^^'
slides.body:
Now I can enqueue my recordings and generate the videos of different sketches at the same time :p

[x] Postgres for the database
[x] Redis to async recording 
[x] Minio for storage

Why? So I can scale, learn new stuff and become a full stack developer XD

slides.title: Also… I was in an art expo!
slides.body:
I built a motion capture sketch using p5.js + Mediapipe for the 'Colour My World' exhibition.

Face and hand tracking = live visuals.

I'll show the result in the next post!

slides.title: IRL: Bought my first car!
slides.body:
Finally found the right fit for the road trip.

It took a lot of searching and messaging; patience was key.

Next week, we hit the road towards Mooloolaba!
